headline: Did Wabtec’s New MTA Hybrid Locomotive Deal Just Recast Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies' (WAB) Investment Narrative?
summary: In early January 2026, Wabtec Corporation announced a follow-on US$386 million order from New York’s MTA for hybrid battery-diesel R255 work locomotives, including spare parts, with production in Erie, Pennsylvania and deliveries starting in 2027 to support cleaner, more efficient transit maintenance. This contract underlines Wabtec’s positioning in lower-emission rail solutions and digitally enabled maintenance, potentially reinforcing its role in global rail modernization projects. Against...
